name: ListAppGroupAssignments
description:
List all group assignments for a specific application.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of app group assignments for a given application by specifying the app ID.

parameters.name: application_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. Use this to specify which application's group assignments to list.

parameters.name: group_name_starts_with_filter
parameters.description: A filter to match group names that start with the specified string for assigned groups.

value_schema.description:
Specifies a filter for a list of assigned groups returned based on their names. The value of `q` is matched against the group `name`. 
This filter only supports the `startsWith` operation that matches the `q` string against the beginning of the [group name](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/Group/#tag/Group/operation/listGroups!c=200&path=profile/name&t=response).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of results. Use the value from the 'next' link in the Link header.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the `next` page of results. Treat this as an opaque value obtained through the next link relationship. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of objects to return per page. Supports pagination by using the `next` link for additional pages.

value_schema.description:
Specifies the number of objects to return per page.
If there are multiple pages of results, the Link header contains a `next` link that you need to use as an opaque value (follow it, don't parse it).
See [Pagination](/#pagination).

parameters.name: return_assigned_group_or_metadata
parameters.description: Optional query to return the assigned group or assignment metadata in the `_embedded` property.

value_schema.description:
An optional query parameter to return the corresponding assigned [group](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/Group/) or 
the group assignment metadata details in the `_embedded` property.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Specifies a filter for a list of assigned groups returned based on their names. The value of `q` is matched against the group `name`. 
This filter only supports the `startsWith` operation that matches the `q` string against the beginning of the [group name](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/Group/#tag/Group/operation/listGroups!c=200&path=profile/name&t=response).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the `next` page of results. Treat this as an opaque value obtained through the next link relationship. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the `next` page of results. Treat this as an opaque value obtained through the next link relationship. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

See [Pagination](/#pagination).

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description:
An optional query parameter to return the corresponding assigned [group](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/Group/) or
